required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Single-Dose Fluzoparib in Healthy Chinese Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Open-Label, One-Center Study to Evaluate the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Single-Dose Fluzoparib in Healthy Chinese Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: Study to Evaluate the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Single-Dose Fluzoparib in Healthy Chinese Subjects

detailed_description.textblock: This study will be a single-center, open-label, single dosing Fluzoparib study in healthy Chinese subjects to evaluate the pharmacokinetics and safety

primary_outcome.description: Time of the observed maximum plasma concentration of SHR3162
Maximum observed plasma concentration of SHR3162
Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from the time zero to the last quantifiable concentration of SHR3162
• Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero extrapolated to infinity of SHR3162
Terminal plasma elimination half-life of SHR3162
Apparent volume of distribution of SHR3162

clinical_study.condition: Healthy Adult Male and Female Volunteers

arm_group.description: A single dose of fluzoparib was administered orally

intervention.description: A single oral dose of fluzoparib on Day 1
